# prompt

**Instance Property**

A single line of text that displays at the top of the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var prompt: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`.

## Getting and setting properties

- **leftItemsSupplementBackButton**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the left items display in addition to the Back button.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the left items display in addition to the Back button.
items.name: leftItemsSupplementBackButton
